snippet: The failures of Mitt Romney’s 2012 campaign and the possibility of a Jeb Bush candidacy have many Republicans hoping there won’t be a third try in 2016.
abstract: Mitt Romney's hints that he may run in 2016 presidential election have excited his supporters, but some Republicans around the country show low enthusiasm for a third candidacy attempt; wide gulf exists between Romney's affluent network of donors and grass-roots activists, but early polls show him leading GOP field.
lead_paragraph: The failures of Mitt Romney’s 2012 campaign and the possibility of a Jeb Bush candidacy have many Republicans hoping there won’t be a third try in 2016.

headline.main: Third Chance for Romney? G.O.P. Is Torn
headline.print_headline: Third Chance for Romney? G.O.P. Is Torn
